channel.title: The latest compiler and run for latest java! and for all java from update 6
channel.description:
khanzscape compiler the best
[code]@echo off cls title Khanzscape compiler :main echo Welcome to Khanzscape compiler echo Select an option below to begin echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo c - Compile Server echo r - Runserver echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ set /p select= Selection: if %select%==c goto compile if %select%==r goto run if %select%==C goto compile if %select%==R goto run
cls pause
:compile IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN" (goto compile1) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN" (goto compile2) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN" (goto compile3) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN" (goto compile4) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN" (goto compile5)
:compile1 cls title Compiling... echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_01 echo Compiling Server, Please Wait... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause cls goto main
:compile2 cls title Compiling... echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_02 echo Compiling Server, Please Wait... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause cls goto main
:compile3 cls title Compiling... echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_03 echo Compiling Server, Please Wait... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause cls goto main
:compile4 cls title Compiling... echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_04 echo Compiling Server, Please Wait... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause cls goto main
:compile5 cls title Compiling... echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_05 echo Compiling Server, Please Wait... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause cls goto main
goto main
:run IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN" (goto run1) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN" (goto run2) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN" (goto run3) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN" (goto run4) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN" (goto run5)
:run1 cls title khanzscape server runner echo Found: Java JDK JDK1.6.0_01 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" server pause
:run2 cls title khanzscape server runner echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_02 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe" server pause
:run3 cls title khanzscape server runner echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_03 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" server pause
:run4 cls title khanzscape server runner echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_04 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\java.exe" server pause
:run5 cls title khanzscape server runner echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_05 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\java.exe" server pause[/code]

item.title: The latest compiler and run for latest java! and for all java from update 6
item.dc:creator: @muslim786 muslim786
item.description:
@muslim786 wrote:

khanzscape compiler the best

[code]@echo off
cls
title Khanzscape compiler
:main
echo Welcome to Khanzscape compiler
echo Select an option below to begin
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo c - Compile Server
echo r - Runserver
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
set /p select= Selection:
if %select%==c goto compile
if %select%==r goto run
if %select%==C goto compile
if %select%==R goto run

cls
pause

:compile
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (goto compile1)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (goto compile2)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (goto compile3)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (goto compile4)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (goto compile5)

:compile1
cls
title Compiling…
echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_01
echo Compiling Server, Please Wait…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto main

:compile2
cls
title Compiling…
echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_02
echo Compiling Server, Please Wait…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto main

:compile3
cls
title Compiling…
echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_03
echo Compiling Server, Please Wait…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto main

:compile4
cls
title Compiling…
echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_04
echo Compiling Server, Please Wait…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto main

:compile5
cls
title Compiling…
echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_05
echo Compiling Server, Please Wait…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto main

goto main

:run
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (goto run1)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (goto run2)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (goto run3)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (goto run4)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (goto run5)

:run1
cls
title khanzscape server runner
echo Found: Java JDK JDK1.6.0_01
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe” server
pause

:run2
cls
title khanzscape server runner
echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_02
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\java.exe” server
pause

:run3
cls
title khanzscape server runner
echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_03
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe” server
pause

:run4
cls
title khanzscape server runner
echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_04
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\java.exe” server
pause

:run5
cls
title khanzscape server runner
echo Found: Java JDK 1.6.0_05
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\java.exe” server
pause[/code]
